# shinyexperiments

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of shinyexperiments is to provide a low-code interface to the tidymodels
package while preserving and enhancing its underlying machine learning principles.

This package is currently in active development and is not yet ready for use.
